00 00000000
07 00000111

c0 11000000
c7 11000111

f0 11110000
f7 11110111

fc 11111100
fb 11111011

ff 11111111
f8 11111000

ff 11111111 c0 11000000
38 00111000

ff 11111111 f0 11110000
08 00001000



11111111
11000000
--------
00111111
00000111
00111000

11111111
11110000
00001111
00000111
00001000

it's an XOR parity check!!!
